definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: Therefore, we will invite the listed rich to talk about the two topics.
sentences.chinese: 因此我們還將邀請上榜富豪們共話這兩個話題。
